updateDimensions(Vector2Int) - Method in class gui.LogicBoardGUI
If a gate gets placed at the outermost column or row of the current grid, expand the grid.
updateGateInputs(Gate, Gate) - Method in class boardModel.LogicBoard
Checks all gates on the board if they have "from" as an input, and if so, replace that input with "to".
updateGUI() - Method in class boardModel.LogicBoard
Draws the tiles representing gates and their connections.
updateRedoMenu(int) - Method in class gui.LogicBoardGUI
Communicate with the menuBar, to only have the "Redo" menu item enabled, when there actually is an undone command to redo.
updateRedoMenu(int) - Method in class gui.LogicBoardMenu
Only have the "Redo" menu item enabled, if the number of commands that can be redone is positive.
updateUndoMenu(int) - Method in class gui.LogicBoardGUI
Communicate with the menuBar, to only have the "Undo" menu item enabled, when there actually is a command to undo.
updateUndoMenu(int) - Method in class gui.LogicBoardMenu
Only have the "Undo" menu item enabled, if the number of commands that can be undone is positive.
